item.title: Report X-2025041834
item.description:
Report X-2025041834

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-28T03:42:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-19
  • City: EARTH CITY
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE BOTTOM OF THE PACKAGE FAILED ON UNLOADING LINE 7. SORTER WAS ABLE TO TURN BOX WITHOUT TOUCHING CONTENTS AND PLACE THE PACKAGE ON THE GROUND. DMP RESPODED TO THE PACKAGE WITH DECISION TREE AND PROPPER PPE. PACKAGE WAS TAKEN TO DMP AREA AND THEN PROCESSED ACORDING TO THE CORROSIVE SOLIDS RESPONSE SHEETS.
